alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:07PM EST until December 19 at 2:09AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Canajoharie Creek near Canajoharie. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, the creek is out of its banks and floods nearby properties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:31 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 9.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Canajoharie Creek Canajoharie Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 9.1 Forecast: Wed 6 pm MSG Thu 12 am MSG Thu 6 am MSG Thu 12 pm MSG Thu 6 pm MSG Fri 12 am MSG Fri 6 am MSG Fri 12 pm MSG Fri 6 pm MSG Sat 12 am MSG Sat 6 am MSG Sat 12 pm MSG &&
